title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Learning-Execution Projects to Improve MOOC Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social science knowledge and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Design and execute at least three social problem-solving projects using code-based simulation tools
Communicate in real-time with team members on an online collaboration platform and share project deliverables at least once
Perform programming tasks (minimum five compilations/executions) using a web-based IDE and share results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
